backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining light/dark CSS variables and applying global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app with manifest, theme color, and favicon.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout with router, header logic, and tabbed footer navigation hidden on certain routes.
Breathing circle component showing timed phases, animations, colors, and optional segmented progress ring.
frontend/src/components/charts/BreathHol: Generates a simple SVG line chart of breath-hold durations over time with plotted points.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyMin: Renders a bar chart showing weekly exercise minutes scaled relative to the maximum value.
frontend/src/components/CustomPatternFor: Form allowing users to edit inhale, hold, and exhale durations for custom breathing patterns.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseTileCard: Clickable exercise tile with icon, text, and an info button that prevents event propagation.
frontend/src/components/HomeExerciseCard: Home screen exercise card with start behavior, duration editing dialog, and optional info handler.
frontend/src/components/SegmentedCircumf: Renders an SVG circular progress indicator split into segments with filled segments based on elapsed time.
frontend/src/components/SessionList.tsx: Displays a table of session history with formatted dates and durations.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeCo: Provides a vertical slider UI component for adjusting volume with an optional icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingEngine.ts: Implements a timed breathing cycle engine with phases, voice guidance, haptics, and pause/resume logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useHaptics.ts: Provides a simple wrapper for triggering device vibration.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerExerciseDuratio: Stores and retrieves per-exercise durations with local persistence and default fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Requests and releases a screen wake lock based on an active state flag.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styling, Tailwind layers, theme variables, and breathing animation keyframes.
frontend/src/lib/ambientAudio.ts: Controls exclusive playback of rain or waves audio with adjustable volume and play/stop utilities.
frontend/src/lib/breathingPatterns.ts: Defines breathing pattern types, preset patterns, and a helper to compute safe cycle durations.
frontend/src/lib/exerciseInfoContent.ts: Provides structured instructional and informational text for each breathing exercise.
frontend/src/lib/localStorageStore.ts: Handles reading and writing breath-hold records, breathing sessions, and per‑exercise durations in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/playerDurationGuards.ts: Validates session durations and prevents premature auto-stop via safety thresholds.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines data structures for breath-hold records and breathing session logs.
frontend/src/lib/statsDerivations.ts: Generates weekly minutes, breath-hold chart data, and recent session lists from stored session data.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Centralizes localStorage key constants for all stored breathing data.
frontend/src/lib/voiceGuidance.ts: Implements speech synthesis helpers for voice guidance with volume control and queued/async modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider, rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with app info, premium upsell, and quick settings UI.
frontend/src/pages/Custom.tsx: Allows users to configure a custom breathing pattern and start a session with it.
frontend/src/pages/ExerciseInfo.tsx: Displays detailed info for a selected breathing exercise, including instructions and expandable sections, with back navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Shows exercise tiles allowing users to start a session, adjust duration, or view info, plus access the breath-hold test.
frontend/src/pages/Player.tsx: Runs the breathing exercise player with pattern loading, timers, audio, voice guidance, auto-stop, and session logging.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Provides UI controls for audio, haptics, and notification preferences.
frontend/src/pages/Stats.tsx: Displays weekly breathing stats, breath-hold trends, and recent session history using charts and tables.
frontend/src/pages/Test.tsx: Implements a breath-hold timer with start/stop controls and logs durations while showing the all-time record.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load to enable PWA features.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling class-based dark mode, custom fonts, breakpoints, OKLCH color variables, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing ZenBreathe’s features, versioning, and current frontend/backend capabilities in a structured state file.
